transArray.content:
A great stay experience! The location is easy to find, right on the roadside. The most important thing is that the service is excellent. The ID card they gave me when I checked in was put in a protective cover. Because I was carrying a big box, they even sent me upstairs. Then there are tea sets and two different kinds of tea in the room~very good! Takeaways will be delivered to your door by robots, which is safe and convenient. Before leaving, I was given a box of tea, which was a surprise~
Clean, hygienic and considerate ~ good reviews

Passing through the years, meeting time, meeting vegetation, meeting the past, it is the beauty that settles in the quiet place of time. Your recognition is a great honor for Xiaoji, and Xiaoji is looking forward to you.
